title: Gazebo's installed CMake configuration should export Boost and Protobuf libs

content.raw:
When compiling a client program against Gazebo's libraries, I have to explicitly link against some Boost libraries, even though my code doesn't call Boost.  This is also done in the [listener example](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/b2d2cf062c2b09177badd4a63a1aa5a4e6791485/examples/stand_alone/listener/CMakeLists.txt?at=default#cl-8).  It's (some of) Gazebo's libs that depend on Boost, so Gazebo should add them to `GAZEBO_LIBRARIES` for use by client programs.

Same goes for protobuf.
